mapper.select:
/* 청취 이력 count selectCount */ select count(*) as tot_cnt ,ceil(count(*) / ${top_cnt}) as page_cnt from tbl_listen_hist where 1=1 and listen_datm between to_date(#{listen_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{listen_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and listen_id like #{listen_id} || '%'
and listen_name like #{listen_name} || '%'
and rec_datm between to_date(#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'

/* 청취 이력 전체 조회 (엑셀다운로드) selectListAll */ select to_char(tlh.listen_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as listen_datm ,tlh.listen_id ,tlh.listen_name ,tlh.listen_ip ,to_char(tlh.rec_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rec_datm ,tlh.rec_keycode ,tlh.rec_filename ,tlh.user_id ,tlh.user_name ,tlh.local_no ,nvl(tlh.reason_code,'') as reason_code ,nvl(tlh.reason_text,'') as reason_text ,(case when nvl(tlh.reason_code, '') != '' then fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON', tlh.reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code and mpart_code = tu.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = tu.bpart_code and mpart_code = tu.mpart_code and spart_code = tu.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_listen_hist tlh left join tbl_user tu on tlh.listen_id = tu.user_id where 1=1 and tlh.listen_datm between to_date(#{listen_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{listen_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and tlh.listen_id like #{listen_id} || '%'
and tlh.listen_name like #{listen_name} || '%'
and tlh.rec_datm between to_date(#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and tlh.user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and tlh.user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and tlh.reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
order by tlh.${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}
